question: Which famous platform has introduced a feature called ‘bedtime reminder’, as a part of its wellness and screen time tools?
explanation:
YouTube has recently has introduced a feature called ‘bedtime reminder’, which will enable the user to cut down his screen time without compromising their sleep.
This new feature has been rolled out as a part of YouTube’s wellness and screen time tools. It was released during Google’s Digital Wellbeing initiative. The feature enables the user to set a reminder at a specific time to stop watching videos and go to bed. The ‘Take a Break’ feature that lets users to set reminders to take a break from watching videos.
